message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to your business. My initial offer is $1,150,000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I recognize your valuation, I believe this product offers significant value beyond your initial offer. How about we meet in the middle at $1,075,000?

I'm still very interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $1,000,000. I'd like to meet you at this price, as I've already had an offer from another seller for this price. Can you consider this offer?
